Relevance (Biomarkers/Cancer): Baseline for comparing with disease biomarkers

Metadata Included: Yes (periodontitis vs. healthy groups, clinical labels)
Relevance (Biomarkers/Cancer): Direct biomarker dataset for gum disease
Identifies potential saliva biomarker taxa worldwide

Dataset: Characterization of the salivary microbiome of adults with inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)
Sample Size: 320 saliva samples (160 IBD cases: Crohn’s disease, Ulcerative colitis, both; matched 1:1 with 160 healthy controls)
Metadata Included: Yes — demographics, smoking status, diet, BMI, medications, dental visit frequency, etc.
Clinical Context: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD: Crohn’s, UC) vs healthy controls
Relevance (Biomarkers/Cancer): Identifies potential microbial biomarkers (Veillonella, Streptococcus enriched in IBD)
